data.text: @BattleBots @Discovery i miss them. they are on so little.

@MonsoonRobot @BattleBots @Discovery Too bad the UK bot builders live in a socialist country which won't allow them to participate. If the Brazilians are allowed free access .. why not the UK. Wait .. answer it #TheIdiotsAreInCharge !
@Pulsar815712361 @BattleBots @Discovery They normally are, but it's an American based team running it thus season
@CarlAdams94 @BattleBots @Discovery Yeah, it's weird not seeing Death Roll, Wan Hoo, Rail Gun Max, Petunia, The 4 Horsemen, and others not competing this year
@MonsoonRobot @BattleBots @Discovery Can't wait to see you guys back in the box
